content.rendered:
Ufreetv is a free live TV video service website. All the videos and streams on Ufreetv are not hosted by Ufreetv. Ufreetv makes them available to you by way of embed codes from sites such as UStream, YouTube and publicly available IPTV international channels etc.

Some channels in IPTV may not always work 24/7, sometimes they also go offline at the origin source. Ufreetv only provides links to these channels/streams which are hosted at their respective stream origin.

If you see a stream/channel is not working you can let us know by using our CONTACT FORM  and tell us which stream/channel is not working – If possible, we will update the link to the channel.

 

LEGAL:

No video files are stored in this website.

This website simply contains user-submitted links to publicly available video stream URLs, which to the best of our knowledge have been intentionally made public by the copyright holders.

If any links in these playlists infringe on your rights as a copyright holder, they may be removed by sending a removal request. However, note that we have no control over the destination of the link, and just removing the link from the playlist will not remove its contents from the web.

Note that linking does not directly infringe copyright because no copy is made on the site providing the link, and thus this is not a valid reason to send a DMCA notice to Ufreetv. To remove this content from the web, you should contact the web host that’s actually hosting the content (not Ufreetv, nor the maintainers of this website).
